text: Lady with black hat (also known as Signora con cappello nero) is a 19th- century painting, in oil by the italian noble painter Giuseppe Amisani, made in 1913 his part of the official collection of Metropolitan City of Milan. == Description == Small oil painting by Giuseppe Amisani, depicting a half-length woman, with the profile facing left: she is wearing a large black hat and a black dress with a white shirt. == Related pages == * Giuseppe Amisani == Other websites == * * Il cappello nero, Amisani Giuseppe, Lombardia Beni Culturali Category:1910s paintings Category:Paintings in Milan Category:Paintings by Giuseppe Amisani
title: Lady with black hat (Amisani)
